items.preText: Hello and welcome back. Hamilton Masakadza and Cephas Zhuwao walk out. Mashrafe Mortaza has got the new ball.
items.text: length ball, around middle, defended back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length ball, pitching around off and middle, defended on the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length, around off stump this time, Masakadza gets behind the line and blocks again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length ball but way down the leg side this time around
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 wide

items.text: short of length, some extra bounce their, Masakadza dabs it down behind square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: length ball, angling across, kept a tad low there as Zhuwao defends it from the crease
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: length ball, once again angling across, Zhuwao pushes at it and gets beaten
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, no run

items.preText: Mehidy Hasan from the other end
items.text: length ball, driven towards long-on for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: length ball from around the wicket, Zhuwao looks to sweep it from outside off, gets beaten
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: lovely bowling, draws the batsman forward and beats him with turn
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: this one goes straight with the arm, a thick inside edge rolls towards square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length again and another front-foot push back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, Zhuwao was looking to cut it hard but the ball sneaks in through bat and pad
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: crashed away this time, length ball and some room to free his arms and Zhuwao cuts it past backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, FOUR runs

items.text: shorter and wider and Zhuwao once again goes for the cut but the ball remains low and goes underneath the bat, one bounce to the wicketkeeper
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, Zhuwao throws his bat at it, gets a thick outside edge past the first slip, third man cuts it off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just around off, Masakadza pushes at it and the ball races towards third man off the outer half of the bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 run

items.preText: Back to around the wicket to the left-hander
items.text: length ball, around middle, defended towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: down the wicket, but Mehidy sees him and pulls his length back, pushed towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: short and wide and Zhuwao rocks back to hammer it past extra cover for his second four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, FOUR runs

items.text: up and over extra cover this time, Nazmul, in the deep, chases it and pulls it just inside
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, 2 runs

items.text: short of length once again, cuts it again but this time straight to the extra cover fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: pitched up and driven inside out past the extra cover fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: fuller on stumps, pushed to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, no run
